overview: From 2025-08-20 to 2025-08-21, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 0 new PRs (0 merged), 1 new issues, and 7 active contributors.

topIssues.title: op-up: report usage metrics
topIssues.author: tessr
topIssues.body: Our success metrics for https://localchain.optimism.io anchor on how many people make it through the local chain flow. Today, we rely on metrics reported from the website to know whether people are making it through -- but this is imperfect, because not everyone will click on all of the commands, and it doesn't reflect whether people run into problems on their own machines. We should add actual instrumentation to op-up to determine whether it's working for users and if people are falling off anywhere.

topContributors.summary: xxDTECHxx: Focused on expanding token support, successfully merging PR #1188 in ethereum-optimism/ethereum-optimism.github.io to add the Pepe Community (PEPE) token for the Ethereum â†’ Base bridge, demonstrating a primary focus on configuration changes.
killers10: Focused on configuration work, opening one PR, ethereum-optimism/docs#1720, to create a new npm-gulp.yml file, which involved modifying 2 files with 56 additions.
tessr: Focused on foundational work for usage metrics, evidenced by the creation of an issue in ethereum-optimism/optimism (#17164) to report op-up usage metrics.
scagria: Focused on other work, making 3 commits that modified 7 files with a net change of +91 lines, and provided 1 PR comment.
Wazabie: Focused on tests work, modifying 7 files (+123/-41 lines) and providing 1 PR comment, indicating a primary focus on code quality and testing.
